attributes.action: Close non essential construction sites immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Immediately stop workers attending non essential construction sites. This is encouraging the spread of the virus and will cause deaths. Construction cannot function in a way that does not cause close contact.
attributes.background: Close non essential sential construction sites to recent the coronavirus spread as it is IMPOSSIBLE for workers to distance themselves from each other. This is a complete disregard for the health and safety of individuals who are currently forced to work.
